name: The Perfect Bounce
description:
No graphics. No story. No world. There is only you. And the ball. And the endless quest. For The Perfect Bounce.

An idea that was inspired by a Game Jam that I ended up being unable to participate in, however I've been working on this on and off for the past month or two, it's a simple game about bouncing a ball forever. I wanted to make a puzzle game with very simple rules and graphics. This release is the first 5 levels, expect more updates on this in the coming month or two!
